uav.generic.struct.geom

Class PointGeo

  • java.lang.Object
    • uav.generic.struct.geom.Point
      • uav.generic.struct.geom.PointGeo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PointGeo
extends Point
    Concrete class that implements a point using geographic coordinates.
    Since:
    version 2.0.0

      • distance

        public double distance(Point pointDestine)
        Calculates the distance between two coordinates. Note: The return of the method is not in meters, but in degrees. That way, it should be converted to meters.
        Specified by:
        distance in class Point
        Parameters:
        pointDestine - - destination point
        Returns:
        the distance (in degrees) between the current point and the argument.
        Since:
        version 2.0.0
